Atlanta.Kriegshaber House: The Kriegshaber House, now the Wrecking Bar Brewpub, is a historic Beaux-Arts mansion on 292 Moreland Avenue NW in Inman Park, Atlanta. It was built around 1900. Victor Hugo Kriegshaber (1859–1934) was founder and president of the Atlanta Terra Cotta Company as well as director of the Atlanta Art Glass Co.
